root.name: OceanDive
root.description: FeaturesBeautifully realised, living, breathing 3D fish and underwater environmentPhotorealistic sea-scape, with awesome surface special effects (on high-end video cards)Amazing animated ocean creatures and fish, dozens of species, including shark, various tropical fish, tortoise, octopus and clownfishSeek out ancient ruins, a sunken vessel, coral reef, and underwater canyons and grottosTens of thousands of square feet of stunning ocean floor to explore, the next best thing to actual scuba divingOceanDive is one of the most technically advanced 3D ocean screensavers on the market - if you are looking for a stunning 3D fish screensaver, you have found it!
